section.title: Host Availability
section.para: This agent will send heartbeat messages (ping requests) to its host, monitoring the presence of the host on the network and the latency of its connection.

sect2.title: Local/Remote Modes
sect2.para: Because of the nature of its work, the agent should only be deployed in local mode.

sect2.title: Supported Versions
sect2.para: The agent can monitor availability of any TCP/IP enabled host, regardless of the architecture or operating system.

sect2.title: Configuration
sect2.para: The following parameters are available for configuration:

itemizedlist.listitem: Ping timeout: The maximum number of milliseconds to wait on a ping heartbeat before declaring it a miss
Packet size: The number of bytes in the ICMP packet

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The agent will populate the following values:

itemizedlist.listitem: Response time: Ping response time in milliseconds
Heartbeat misses: The number of times the heartbeat timed out
